settings.content: Fièra’s Citrus Stem C Serum is the first step in achieving smoother, hydrated, glowing and even skin. Apply in an upwards motion over the face and even on the neck for additional hydration, patting into dark spots for extra fading power.

Next, apply the Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream on the neck and decolletage, smoothing upwards along the jawline. Formulated with hyaluronic acid, glycolic acid and plant-based squalene, our Multi-Effect Neck + Décolletage Cream exfoliates to reduce lines and discoloration and hydrates to plump and smooth the delicate skin.

The last step is applying our Apple Stem Cell Cream to the face, after the serum has fully absorbed. This isn’t just any moisturizer - formulated with apple stem cells proven to reduce the appearance of crow’s feet and other lines, it also acts as a powerful eye cream.

settings.title:
Introducing Fièra
Beauty Bundle
settings.sub_title: Fiera products have received over 4000 5-Star reviews so far. Join hundreds of thousands of happy customers today!
settings.content: For every concealer and neck cream sold, we donate up to 4 meals to people in need. So far, we have donated over 350.000 meals thanks to our amazing customers. We are proud to be able to make a difference!

settings.title: How Fièra <br class="forMob">Beauty Bundle Works
settings.sub_title: Conceal any imperfections with our concealer, and perfect your look with our silky ultra-lux setting powder. Scientifically formulated to work together, this duo will ensure your makeup is set and guarantee you that fresh all day look long into the evening.
settings.content_1: Covers up even the most stubborn wrinkles, deep fine lines, puffy under-eye bags and unsightly blemishes
settings.content_2: Active ingredients like caprylic triglyceride and hydrolyzed collagen will soften skin and restore suppleness and moisture.
settings.content_3: Fièra Luxury Concealer restores moisture to promote healing of your skin
settings.content_4: Fièra HD matte ultra luxury finishing powder locks in your makeup for all day wear

settings.title: Our Fièra Promise
settings.content: Fièra is not your average beauty line. We offer the highest quality products with unstoppable results. Our products focus on delivering innovative science, quality, and convenience. Not just a beauty brand, Fièra is committed to supporting our community through our partnerships with Food Rescue US and Second Harvest by donating a portion of our sales to help feed those in need.

settings.title: Sodium Hyaluronate
settings.content: The sodium salt of hyaluronic acid, able to hold more water than any other natural substance—up to 1000 times its weight in water for maximum skin hydration that tightens and improves the skin’s overall appearance.

settings.title: Glycolic Acid
settings.content: Removes dead skin cells and impurities leading to a reduction in the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, while also making skin look brighter and healthier.

settings.title: Plant Stem Cells
settings.content: Scientifically-proven plant-based stem cells that delay the signs of skin aging and enhance the appearance of skin elasticity, giving your skin that firmer, tighter and smoother look and feel.

settings.title: Squalane
settings.content: For skin collagen, moisturizes and protects the skin from oxidative damage, resulting in tighter, more hydrated skin softness.

settings.title: Sea Buckthorn Oil
settings.content: Promotes skin cell regeneration, hydration and elasticity, while anti-inflammatory properties help to reduce redness and swelling associated with various skin conditions.

settings.title: Vitamin C
settings.content: Protecting skin cells against oxidative damage from free radicals.

settings.title: Active Ingredients
settings.sub_title: Each product in the Fièra Skincare Bundle contains the highest-quality, proven ingredients. Together, they work as a comprehensive all-in-one solution for dry, dull skin; dark spots, hyperpigmentation and redness; sagging, fine lines and wrinkles.
